header:
**[NEW] Now you can import worlds DIRECTLY from Minecraft inside the app!
(Tap Import on the 'World' Tab)** - Please check the **'Importing Worlds From Minecraft'** section further down this page for other ways to import.

data.title: Introduction
body: Firstly, thank you for downloading _**Block Box**_ - We work very hard to bring you the most amazing ground breaking apps :)

_**Block Box**_ is the first and only iOS App that allows you to edit settings and inventory in Minecraft directly on your iOS device. With _**Block Box**_, you can control literally every single setting and aspect of your world - settings which can't be activated or controlled with the Minecraft App itself.
